website_summaries.verdict: Affordable swimsuits for babies in a variety of cute designs.
pros: Features 3 different designs in 6 to 12 months up to 3T to 4T
Dries quickly and is easy to play in
Non-chemical sun protection for those with sensitive skin (sun protection via tight weaving of fabric)
cons: Material is thin and the suits run small

customer_reviews.title: Best swim suit ever
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our 15 m/o to help protect him from the brutal desert sun and I am so glad we did. It has helped save him from sun-burns and brings a smile to almost every persons face. The fit it pretty true to size, our son is a small fry so the arms are a little long but other than that it fits great. I love the hood and how covered it keeps him. We put sunscreen on under his suit as a pre-caution but I feel like the UV protection of the suit itself is very strong. It's a great suit and we highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Borgos

customer_reviews.title: Thin material, strange proportions
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a huge fan of this suit. The material is very thin and the sizing is weird. I have a little 2 y/o guy (short and skinny). The arms of the suit were hanging on him, but it just barely fit him length-wise. I also don't like that the butt pilled very easily and the pattern isn't that cute IRL.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney S

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: Look adorable, fits well& my baby loves swimming in it.
customer_reviews.author: Tamera York

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: I got this swimsuit for my 18M old son for our 2019 Disney trip. I liked how it didn't ride up his back and I wanted to make sure his skin was safe from the sun. It was perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great simple suit
customer_reviews.text: This is a great simple swim suit to have. 0-6 is still very big on my 5 month old who is 16 pounds but it works and he still has room to grow in it
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: Cute suit. Good price
customer_reviews.text: Cute suit. Rather thin, but is all I needed for my son’s indoor swim class. The only reason I didn’t give it 5 stars is because there seems to be some wear ion the but after just one wear and he maybe sat down twice while practicing in and out of the water.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea DeSisti

customer_reviews.title: Really cute. Too small.
customer_reviews.text: This was much smaller than I would've imagine, you should definitely size 2-3 sizes up. Other than that, great product.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: Runs a little small
customer_reviews.text: I got a set of two for twins' birthday gift. They loved them but unfortunately only got a couple wears out of them because they ran small.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Ehhh could be better but not horrible
customer_reviews.text: Only giving 3 stars because the fabric is super super thin. I don't think it will do much to block out the sun. The sewing is fine but lots of left behind strings that we're not trimmed. Cute design and perfect for this year. My son is 9 months old so he'll only get 1 year out of this anyways but I will not repurchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Thin material
customer_reviews.text: Very thin material. My 6 month olds body is still regulating his temperature so this isn’t ideal. Basically see through when wet. He is 14lbs and it was a bit loose.
customer_reviews.author: Kerron

customer_reviews.title: Darling swim suit
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandson to use in his swimming class at the YMCA - he had outgrown his summer suits and there are no swim suits in the store right now! This fit the bill!
customer_reviews.author: Heather B. Chaney

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!!
customer_reviews.text: This is true to size. Fits my baby just perfect. He can still grow into it. Zipper and material is good quality. I'm super satisfied!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for my one year old
customer_reviews.text: Great material quick drying. My chubby one year old has thick thighs and it was a little tight but otherwise fit great, easy diaper changes, and overall it did exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Size up a size or two runs small
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know if it is just smaller than the size it says or cheap material, but you can see through it. My son wears 18-24 months, I got 24 and it is sooo tight and see through.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia Spell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Fit my baby perfect and the material is good
customer_reviews.author: Danny Caldera

customer_reviews.title: Way too small
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 3yr old. It's cute a bit thin but stretchy. It was way too small for him though. Would better fit a 1yr old
customer_reviews.author: Momshopper

customer_reviews.title: True to size
customer_reviews.text: I order a 6-9 months for a 6 month baby and it fit perfect. Got quality with a cute design.
customer_reviews.author: linice

customer_reviews.title: Cute and fits well
customer_reviews.text: Very cute swimsuit. My 1yo loves her new ,"baby shark," swim suit. Fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Rhiannan Walter

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Cute , fits nice but starting coming apart after 1 wash
customer_reviews.author: M.s

customer_reviews.title: Runs small, but super cute
customer_reviews.text: Love this rash guard. It does run pretty small though. I'd size up 2 sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Y.

customer_reviews.title: Wears and washes well.  Recommend to buy.
customer_reviews.text: Love the outfit, fit snug for a one year old but it is excellent quality.
customer_reviews.author: Rosey

customer_reviews.title: See through
customer_reviews.text: It was completely see through. It might be fine for a baby with a swim diaper, but definitely not for my potty trained toddler
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Bertles

customer_reviews.title: That it had a rash guard and will be comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this swimsuit for my grandson so that he could be protected from the sun. I’ve been shopping around and this seems to be just perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Bernadette O.

customer_reviews.title: Thin material
customer_reviews.text: Very thin material, could see right through the entire design of his swim diaper! Fit was smaller than expected, design was cute.
customer_reviews.author: D-Train

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: It was great, fit perfectly. Everyone loved it his pool party.
customer_reviews.author: Adolfo Flores

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: I got it for 3t it looks like it would fit a newborn
customer_reviews.author: victoria

customer_reviews.title: Runs very small
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a 3T for my child that is almost a 2T now and it was way too small. I couldn’t even squeeze him into it. The pattern was cute but total waste of money since I couldn’t even get his arms through it.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Love

customer_reviews.title: Overall Happy
customer_reviews.text: For the price its a good buy.. but it's kind of cheap material. To be expected though.
customer_reviews.author: mariah

customer_reviews.title: A little small, order one size up
customer_reviews.text: Fits a little small for a toddler with a long torso, but is stretchy so it works.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than others.
customer_reviews.text: Cute swimsuit. Runs bigger than another brand that I bought but that is okay, he’ll grow into it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: It runs way to small. The product is cute though
customer_reviews.author: maxwell tapia

customer_reviews.title: Too thin.
customer_reviews.text: This bathing suit is adorable, but it’s just too thin. Unfortunately the white part of the shark mouth lands in the crotch region, which makes it inappropriate for anything other than your backyard.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Trammel

customer_reviews.title: Great product and comfortable for the kids!
customer_reviews.text: Our little man loves the water and loves this suit! It was awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph J. Arreola

customer_reviews.title: Great fit!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the material and the fit! Bought for my 2-year-old grandson...his mom and I both loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Love it, it is a little see through and definitely not for outside as it has no spf but perfect for indoor pools!
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: Cute, quality product for my 1 year old. Helps protect from the sun and is lightweight so he will not be too hot. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Josh Wenndt

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable 👍
customer_reviews.text: It looked super cute on my son but it was see through and the sleeves were too long 😣
customer_reviews.author: Eric Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Terrible material
customer_reviews.text: Terrible material, super thin, it won't protect the baby from the sun at all it looks like a net!
customer_reviews.author: Carolina

customer_reviews.title: Zipper broke in less than six months!
customer_reviews.text: The zipper broke already! Cheaply made for the price. Very disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Adamshick

customer_reviews.title: Swimsuit babysuit
customer_reviews.text: My baby likes it very much . So comfortable that he can move easily making him enjoy swimming more 😊
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Stenner

customer_reviews.title: Saves from the sun
customer_reviews.text: A lot of compliments on how sweet he looked at the pool
customer_reviews.author: Brian B. Baysinger

customer_reviews.title: Very cute, fits great!
customer_reviews.text: Material is a little thinner then expected but still a nice product
customer_reviews.author: Kim

product_meta.title: Toddler Swimsuits Baby Boy Swimsuit One-Piece Rash Guard Infant Sun Protection Swimwear
feature_bullets: Baby boy swimwear is polyester material
Suitable for summer surfing, beach holiday or swimming training ect
Lovely dinosaur and cartoon fish printed, Front zipper is easy to put-on and take-off, quick drying/low water retention
NO sunscreen chemicals are added, all protection is from the weave of the fabric, Great choice for your kid
Package included: 1* toddler boy bathing suits
